```{r parameters, include=FALSE}
library(deSolve)

options("scipen" = 10)
N <- 1
a <- 1000 #time span
m <- 1 #time step

pbeta_w <- 0.04 #transmission parameter of Iw
pbeta_z <- 0.015 #transmission parameter of Iz

pgammaa <- 0.01 #innate recovery rate
pgamma_tilt <- 0.1 #recovery rate of Iw when treated by antibiotics


prho <- 0.1 #probability of clinical failure

peps <- 0.05 #initial value of the ratio of treated patients

prop <- 0.01 

pc <- 0.99  # competitivity ratio : probability of replacement of Iz by Iw when reinfected and not treated, (1-a) is the probability of the inverse event


```



\begin{aligned}

\frac{dS}{dt} &=- {\beta_w} {I_w}{S} - {\beta_z} {I_z} {S} + {\gamma}  {I_z} + {\gamma}(1 - {\epsilon}){I_w} + {\gamma `}  {\epsilon}  {I_w} \\

\frac{dI_w}{dt} &={\beta_w} {I_w}{S} + {c}(1-{\epsilon})\beta_w{I_w}{I_z} - {\gamma}(1 - {\epsilon}){I_w} - {\gamma `}  {\epsilon}  {I_w} - ((1-{c}) (1-{\epsilon}) + \epsilon) {\beta_z}{I_z}{I_w} - {\rho}{\epsilon}{I_w} \\

\frac{dI_z}{dt} &={\beta_z} {I_z}{S} + ((1-{c})(1-{\epsilon}) + \epsilon) {\beta_z}{I_z}{I_w} + {\rho}{\epsilon}{I_W} - {\gamma}  {I_z} - {c}(1-{\epsilon})\beta_w{I_w}{I_z} \\


 \end{aligned}
 
```{r main}
parameters <- c(beta_w=pbeta_w, beta_z=pbeta_z, gamma=pgammaa, gamma_prim=pgamma_tilt, eps=peps, rho=prho, c=pc )

state <- c(S=1-2*prop, Iw=prop, Iz=prop)

times=seq(0, a, by=m)

SIS=function(times, state, parameters){
  with(as.list(c(state,parameters)),
       {dS = - beta_w*Iw*S - beta_z*Iz*S + gamma*(1-eps)*Iw + gamma_prim*eps*Iw + gamma*Iz
        dIw = beta_w*Iw*S + c*(1-eps)*beta_w*Iw*Iz - ((1-c)*(1-eps)+eps)*beta_z*Iz*Iw - rho*eps*Iw - gamma*(1-eps)*Iw - gamma_prim*eps*Iw
        dIz = beta_z*Iz*S + ((1-c)*(1-eps)+eps)*beta_z*Iz*Iw + rho*eps*Iw - c*(1-eps)*beta_w*Iw*Iz - gamma*Iz
        
        list(c(dS, dIw, dIz))
       })
}

out=as.data.frame(
  ode(y=state, times=times, func=SIS, parms=parameters)
)

```


```{r main_trial, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
plot(times, out$S, main="Trial", xlab="time (steps)", ylab="ratio", ylim=c(0,1), lty=1, lwd=2, type="l")
lines(times, out$Iw, lty=3, lwd=2)
lines(times, out$Iz, lty=2, lwd=2)

legend("topleft" , inset=.05, c("S Susceptible","Iw Sensitive strain", "Iz Resistant strain"), lty=c(1,3,2), lwd=c(2,2,2))
```
